entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblin is described as making no sign of encouragement and continuing to frown at Harry. This suggests that the goblin has a negative attitude towards Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being looked at by the goblin with a frowning expression, indicating that the goblin is reacting to Harry's presence.

relationships.description: The goblin looks at Harry with a frowning expression, indicating a negative reaction towards him.
